transcript:
Customer: [unintelligible]

Hello?
Customer: Sir, yeh Jai Thakur Dev Fly Ash Brick se baat ho rahi hai?
Haa haa.
Good afternoon sir, mai Taufik baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se senior manager, kaise hai aap?
Thik hai sir.
Sir woh abhi aapka jo account yaha IndiaMART me chal raha hai, toh abhi aapki Komal se baat hui hogi, hamari jo executive hai aapka account jo manage kar rahi hai, right?
Haa.




Toh unse baat hone ke baad sir jo aapko feedback jaata hai WhatsApp me, toh usme aapne not satisfied mark kiya tha, toh wohi jaanna chah raha tha ki kya problem aa rahi hai sir abhi?

Abhi bahut problem aa raha hai na.

Ki haa.

Nazdeek me nahi hai na.

Nazdeek me grahak nahi hai.
Aapke area ke aas pass jaha aapka GST registered hai uski baat kar rahe hai sir aap?
Haa.
Bahut saare grahak hai, abhi aapko ek grahak ne 5 November ko message kiya tha sir, yeh inquiry dali thi yeh aapka ash powder ke liye fly ash powder hota hai, grade F chahiye inko, Nitin naam ka buyer hai aur Raigarh se hai. Aapka Raigarh kitna dur padta hai sir aapse?
Raigarh wohi 30-35 kilometer padta hai.
Toh yaha toh deal kar sakte hai na aap sir?

Woh hum log woh nahi pahuchate hai na, lene aayenge toh dete hai.
Sir woh lene 30-25 kilometer dur hai sir toh buyer lene hi aayega aapse. Aur ek aur hai sir yeh Adbhar se ek inquiry aayi hui hai sir aapke paas 1000 piece ki fly ash bricks ki, Vijay Kumar Yadav, inse baat hui thi kya aapke dwara?
Nahi hua nahi hua.
Sir dekhiye inhone aapko saamne se message kiya hua hai sir. Aap ek baar inse baat kijiye ek badi order quantity ka order hai sir yeh. Aur yeh bahut aaram se yeh aapse deal karke jayenge, usse pehle ek inquiry aapke paas aayi hui hai Raigarh se woh bhi hai sir. Inko chahiye 11 inch ka 11 inch ka cement grey rectangular interlock brick. Banate hai aap yeh 11 inch wala?
Nahi bana rahe hai, abhi kewal brick bana rahe hai.
Achha sir brick bana rahe hai.
Toh yeh bhi interlock wala brick hai, yeh nahi bana rahe hai abhi aap?

Aur yeh green fly ash powder hai Rohit karke yeh bhi Bhilai se aayi hui hai sir. Sir aapke aas pass itni aayi hui hai aapke pass toh.

Aap hi ho?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting nearby customers.



Resolution:

- Executive informed about inquiries from nearby areas.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, follow up, product inquiry
